title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the 'Team' entry is missing from the context menu.
OB: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the 'Team' entry is not present in the context menu.
EB: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, opening the context menu does not display the 'Team' entry. The 'Team' entry should be visible in the context menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the folder containing both a .java file and another resource. 
2. Right-click on the .java file or the other resource to open the context menu. 
3. Observe that the 'Team' entry is missing from the context menu.
